The Hindi: language caption of the post claimed the original names of the suspects were Mohammad Pasha, Mohammad Iqbal, Mohammad Raheem, and Mohammad Akram.
The Police Commissioner of Hyderabad: s Cyberabad unit named the four suspects as Mohammed Arif, Jollu Shiva, Jollu Naveen, and Chintakunta Chennakeshavulu in a televised press briefing on December 6, 2019.
